info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 8:07PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Bladen, southeastern Robeson and northwestern Columbus Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 808 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Evergreen, or 12 miles west of Whiteville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Whiteville, Chadbourn, Bladenboro, Boardman, Abbottsburg, Barnesville, Evergreen, Southeastern Community College, Cerro Gordo, Orrum and Columbus Regional Healthcare System. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
